artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
creditline:

Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, on image, lettered: Claude Lorr [?] fe | LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude delint. / No. 70. | BC, in margin below image, lettered: Pub. Decr. 1. 1810, by Boydell & Co. title: Study of Roman Ruins with Trees
